attributes.action: End illegal immigration and return UK back to British
attributes.additional_details: The government are choosing to help other country's and immigrants when we are in poverty and the British people are homeless and can barely survive
attributes.background: Stop illegal immigration Immediately and send all the illegal immigrants back to there country restore the uk and start housing.the homeless and our war veterans who fought for our country

rejection.details:
